pages.text: $(li)Leafcutter Ants are neutral creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will harvest leaves for the near trees for their colonies.

$(li)If you break a leafcutter anthill the Leafcutter Ant Queen will appear.$(br)$(li)This is a bigger and stronger version of the worker Leafcutter Ant.$(br)$(li)Ant Queens may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/leafcutter_ant_pupa)Leafcutter Ant Pupa$(/l) upon death.
